014package org.microbean.construct.type;
015
016import java.util.ArrayList;
017import java.util.Collection;
018import java.util.Collections;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.Optional;
021
022import javax.lang.model.type.ArrayType;
023import javax.lang.model.type.DeclaredType;
024import javax.lang.model.type.ErrorType;
025import javax.lang.model.type.ExecutableType;
026import javax.lang.model.type.IntersectionType;
027import javax.lang.model.type.NoType;
028import javax.lang.model.type.NullType;
029import javax.lang.model.type.PrimitiveType;
030import javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind;
031import javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror;
032import javax.lang.model.type.TypeVariable;
033import javax.lang.model.type.TypeVisitor;
034import javax.lang.model.type.UnionType;
035import javax.lang.model.type.WildcardType;
036
037import org.microbean.construct.UniversalConstruct;
038import org.microbean.construct.Domain;
039
040import org.microbean.construct.element.UniversalElement;
041
042import static javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind.NONE;
043import static javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind.VOID;
044
045/**
046 * A {@link TypeMirror} and {@link UniversalConstruct} implementation.
047 *
048 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson" target="_top">Laird Nelson</a>
049 *
050 * @see TypeMirror#getKind()
051 *
052 * @see UniversalConstruct
053 */
054public final class UniversalType
055  extends UniversalConstruct<TypeMirror>
056  implements ArrayType,
057             ErrorType,
058             ExecutableType,
059             IntersectionType,
060             NoType,
061             NullType,
062             PrimitiveType,
063             TypeVariable,
064             UnionType,
065             WildcardType {
066
067  /**
068   * Creates a new {@link UniversalType}.
069   *
070   * @param delegate a {@link TypeMirror} to which operations will be delegated; must not be {@code null}
071   *
072   * @param domain a {@link Domain} from which the supplied {@code delegate} is presumed to have originated; must not be
073   * {@code null}
074   *
075   * @exception NullPointerException if either argument is {@code null}
076   *
077   * @see #delegate()
078   */
079  @SuppressWarnings("try")
080  public UniversalType(final TypeMirror delegate, final Domain domain) {
081    super(delegate, domain);
082  }
083
084  @Override // TypeMirror
085  public final <R, P> R accept(final TypeVisitor<R, P> v, final P p) {
086    return switch (this.getKind()) {
087    case ARRAY        -> v.visitArray(this, p);
088    case DECLARED     -> v.visitDeclared(this, p);
089    case ERROR        -> v.visitError(this, p);
090    case EXECUTABLE   -> v.visitExecutable(this, p);
091    case INTERSECTION -> v.visitIntersection(this, p);
092    case
093      MODULE,
094      NONE,
095      PACKAGE,
096      VOID            -> v.visitNoType(this, p);
097    case NULL         -> v.visitNull(this, p);
098    case
099      BOOLEAN,
100      BYTE,
101      CHAR,
102      DOUBLE,
103      FLOAT,
104      INT,
105      LONG,
106      SHORT           -> v.visitPrimitive(this, p);
107    case TYPEVAR      -> v.visitTypeVariable(this, p);
108    case UNION        -> v.visitUnion(this, p);
109    case WILDCARD     -> v.visitWildcard(this, p);
110    case OTHER        -> v.visitUnknown(this, p);
111    };
112  }
113
114  @Override // Various
115  public final UniversalElement asElement() {
116    return switch (this.getKind()) {
117    case DECLARED -> UniversalElement.of(((DeclaredType)this.delegate()).asElement(), this.domain());
118    case TYPEVAR  -> UniversalElement.of(((TypeVariable)this.delegate()).asElement(), this.domain());
119    default -> null;
120    };
121  }
122
123  @Override // UnionType
124  public final List<? extends UniversalType> getAlternatives() {
125    return switch (this.getKind()) {
126    case UNION -> this.wrap(((UnionType)this.delegate()).getAlternatives());
127    default -> List.of();
128    };
129  }
130
131  @Override // IntersectionType
132  public final List<? extends UniversalType> getBounds() {
133    return switch (this.getKind()) {
134    case INTERSECTION -> this.wrap(((IntersectionType)this.delegate()).getBounds());
135    default -> List.of();
136    };
137  }
138
139  @Override // ArrayType
140  public final UniversalType getComponentType() {
141    return switch (this.getKind()) {
142    case ARRAY -> this.wrap(((ArrayType)this.delegate()).getComponentType());
143    default -> this.wrap(this.domain().noType(NONE));
144    };
145  }
146
147  @Override // DeclaredType
148  public final UniversalType getEnclosingType() {
149    return switch(this.getKind()) {
150    case DECLARED -> this.wrap(((DeclaredType)this.delegate()).getEnclosingType());
151    default -> this.wrap(this.domain().noType(NONE));
152    };
153  }
154
155  @Override // WildcardType
156  public final UniversalType getExtendsBound() {
157    return switch (this.getKind()) {
158    case WILDCARD -> this.wrap(((WildcardType)this.delegate()).getExtendsBound());
159    default -> null;
160    };
161  }
162
163  @Override // TypeMirror
164  public final TypeKind getKind() {
165    return this.delegate().getKind();
166  }
167
168  @Override // TypeVariable
169  public final UniversalType getLowerBound() {
170    return switch (this.getKind()) {
171    case TYPEVAR -> this.wrap(((TypeVariable)this.delegate()).getLowerBound());
172    default -> this.wrap(this.domain().nullType()); // bottom (null) type, not NONE type
173    };
174  }
175
176  @Override // TypeVariable
177  public final UniversalType getUpperBound() {
178    return switch (this.getKind()) {
179    case TYPEVAR -> this.wrap(((TypeVariable)this.delegate()).getUpperBound());
180    default -> this.wrap(this.domain().javaLangObject().asType());
181    };
182  }
183
184  @Override // ExecutableType
185  public final List<? extends UniversalType> getParameterTypes() {
186    return switch (this.getKind()) {
187    case EXECUTABLE -> this.wrap(((ExecutableType)this.delegate()).getParameterTypes());
188    default -> List.of();
189    };
190  }
191
192  @Override // ExecutableType
193  public final UniversalType getReceiverType() {
194    return switch (this.getKind()) {
195    case EXECUTABLE -> this.wrap(((ExecutableType)this.delegate()).getReceiverType());
196    default -> this.wrap(this.domain().noType(NONE));
197    };
198  }
199
200  @Override // ExecutableType
201  public final UniversalType getReturnType() {
202    return switch (this.getKind()) {
203    case EXECUTABLE -> this.wrap(((ExecutableType)this.delegate()).getReturnType());
204    default -> this.wrap(this.domain().noType(VOID));
205    };
206  }
207
208  @Override // WildcardType
209  public final UniversalType getSuperBound() {
210    return switch (this.getKind()) {
211    case WILDCARD -> this.wrap(((WildcardType)this.delegate()).getSuperBound());
212    default -> null;
213    };
214  }
215
216  @Override // ExecutableType
217  public final List<? extends UniversalType> getThrownTypes() {
218    return switch (this.getKind()) {
219    case EXECUTABLE -> this.wrap(((ExecutableType)this.delegate()).getThrownTypes());
220    default -> List.of();
221    };
222  }
223
224  @Override // DeclaredType
225  public final List<? extends UniversalType> getTypeArguments() {
226    return switch (this.getKind()) {
227    case DECLARED -> this.wrap(((DeclaredType)this.delegate()).getTypeArguments());
228    default -> List.of();
229    };
230  }
231
232  @Override // ExecutableType
233  public final List<? extends UniversalType> getTypeVariables() {
234    return switch (this.getKind()) {
235    case EXECUTABLE -> this.wrap(((ExecutableType)this.delegate()).getTypeVariables());
236    default -> List.of();
237    };
238  }
239
240  @Override // TypeMirror
241  public final int hashCode() {
242    return this.delegate().hashCode();
243  }
244
245  @Override // TypeMirror
246  public final boolean equals(final Object other) {
247    return this == other || switch (other) {
248    case null -> false;
249    case TypeMirror her -> this.domain().sameType(this, her);
250    default -> false;
251    };
252  }
253
254  private final List<? extends UniversalType> wrap(final Collection<? extends TypeMirror> ts) {
255    return of(ts, this.domain());
256  }
257
258  private final UniversalType wrap(final TypeMirror t) {
259    return of(t, this.domain());
260  }
261
262
263  /*
264   * Static methods.
265   */
266
267
268  /**
269   * Returns a non-{@code null}, immutable {@link List} of {@link UniversalType}s whose elements wrap the supplied
270   * {@link List}'s elements.
271   *
272   * @param ts a {@link Collection} of {@link TypeMirror}s; must not be {@code null}
273   *
274   * @param domain a {@link Domain}; must not be {@code null}
275   *
276   * @return a non-{@code null}, immutable {@link List} of {@link UniversalType}s
277   *
278   * @exception NullPointerException if either argument is {@code null}
279   */
280  public static final List<? extends UniversalType> of(final Collection<? extends TypeMirror> ts, final Domain domain) {
281    if (ts.isEmpty()) {
282      return List.of();
283    }
284    final List<UniversalType> newTs = new ArrayList<>(ts.size());
285    for (final TypeMirror t : ts) {
286      newTs.add(of(t, domain));
287    }
288    return Collections.unmodifiableList(newTs);
289  }
290
291  /**
292   * Returns a non-{@code null} {@link UniversalType} that is either the supplied {@link TypeMirror} (if it itself is
293   * {@code null} or is a {@link UniversalType}) or one that wraps it.
294   *
295   * @param t a {@link TypeMirror}; may be {@code null} in which case {@code null} will be returned
296   *
297   * @param domain a {@link Domain}; must not be {@code null}
298   *
299   * @return a {@link UniversalType}, or {@code null} (if {@code t} is {@code null})
300   *
301   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code domain} is {@code null}
302   *
303   * @see #UniversalType(TypeMirror, Domain)
304   */
305  public static final UniversalType of(final TypeMirror t, final Domain domain) {
306    return switch (t) {
307    case null -> null;
308    case UniversalType ut -> ut;
309    default -> new UniversalType(t, domain);
310    };
311  }
312
313}
